Package org.example.data

Interface Dao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseDao
    public interface Dao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • beginGame

        Game beginGame​(Game game)
        A method that is used for the Postman interaction with the app. Begins a new game, generates an answer and adds to the SQL DB.
        Parameters:
        game - - Empty Game object
        Returns:
        the new game Game object

      • createGame

        Game createGame()
        A method that is the local console version of the app. Begins a new game, generates an answer and adds to the SQL DB.
        Returns:
        the new game Game object

      • guess

        Round guess​(Round round)
        A method that takes a user guess for a specific game via an ID via Postman. Temporarily adds this to the DB before accessing it and then removing it to allow repeated guesses for the same game.
        Parameters:
        round - - Round Object containing the user submitted game_id and guess values
        Returns:
        the guess inside the Round object

      • compareGuess

        java.lang.Boolean compareGuess​(Game game,
                               java.lang.String userGuess)
        A simple method to compare the user guess to the answer. Report back to the user the number of bulls & cows they have or if they are correct.
        Parameters:
        game - - The Game object being guessed to
        userGuess - - The guess from the user
        Returns:
        true if the user guesses correctly, false otherwise

      • updateDB

        java.lang.Boolean updateDB​(Game game)
        A very simple method to update the DB for new Game values.
        Parameters:
        game - - The Game object to be updated too
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Game> getAll()
        A simple method to retrieve every game from the DB.
        Returns:
        an array list of all the games in the DB

      • getById

        Game getById​(int id)
        A simple method to retrieve a specific game from the DB based on id.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of the game
        Returns:
        the specific Game object for that game

      • deleteRoomById

        java.lang.Boolean deleteRoomById​(int id)
        A simple method to delete a specific game from the DB based on id.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of the game
        Returns:
        true if successful
